allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete Aura car-sharing platform with all features

Features:
- Full-stack Next.js 15 car-sharing platform (Turo clone)
- Working filter system (price, car type, features, transmission)
- Working sort functionality (price, rating, distance, recommended)
- Load more pagination with dynamic count
- Relevant car images from Unsplash
- Authentication with NextAuth.js (credentials + Google OAuth)
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
- Complete booking system with status management
- User profiles with activity tracking
- Car listing management
- Review and rating system

Technical Stack:
- Next.js 15 with App Router and Turbopack
- React 19 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS 4 with custom theming
- Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Docker support with docker-compose
- Multiple deployment options (Vercel, Netlify, Docker, Nexlayer)

Components & Pages:
- Homepage with hero section and search
- Car listings with advanced filtering and sorting
- Car detail pages with image galleries
- Booking management system
- User authentication (sign in/sign up)
- User profile with stats and activity
- Car listing form for owners

Database Models:
- User (with OAuth support)
- Car (with features, images, location)
- Booking (with status workflow)
- Review (with ratings)
- Account/Session (NextAuth)

Documentation:
- CLAUDE.md for AI assistance
- DEPLOYMENT.md with multi-platform deployment guides
- README.md with comprehensive setup instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
